Word's come in for you, . Consul Dougal wants you back in Velika as soon as possible.

Something about supporting efforts on the home front. Best get moving.

Thank you for coming this far, . Let me cut to the chase. Supporting the war effort's affected the quality of life throughout the federation.

The federation's sending you and other agents to support the magistrates, gather material goods, and provide some relief.

Report to Magistrate Arn in Lumbertown. Show the citizens that they're just as much of a priority as the argons.

Nature provides but enemies plunder. We're short on raw materials.

What we need most are verdra fibers, krymetal ore, and some sun essence. Without those, it's hard to make a living around here.
This will help out a lot! We can repair our tools, tend to our lands, and heal our hurts. Thank you.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Honored to be of service."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

You're far too modest. I'm sure Magistrate Bisi will agree when he sees you. He's in Popolion, and in more dire need than we were.

May Velik bless you.
Times are tough for everyone. We're just asking for some help with the bare necessities.

Yes, Lumbertown's starved for raw materials. Can you help?

Gather sylva fibers, linmetal ore, and some essence of wind, please? There's no glory in this, but it would help us all.

Thank you so much!

Nature does provide—when nature has 's help!"All in a day's work."

We will never forget what you did for us. Never!

New orders have come in for you. Looks like you're going to Tulufan. They need you next.

May Seren bless you!
You can get all I asked for from Popolion's fields. I'd go but for the monsters...

About damned time!

I've written so many letters to Velika that I've probably got my own wing in the archives.

Our stores were stolen recently. We'll get by—if we can replenish our stocks of shetla fibers, normetal ore, and star essence.

Can you help?

Not bad. Adequate even.

If we'd known the federation would abandon us, we'd never have joined in the first place."We're in this together."

Hmph. Maybe.

Consul Dougal says you're to head to Tria in Southern Shara next.

Kaia's blessings protect you, .
Well, I guess we could make do with sand. Bloody useful stuff, right? Can't make clothes, can't make weapons, but it can make anyone itch!

We're grateful for any assistance.

Supplies are low at the moment. In particular, we need toira fibers, shadmetal ore, and some essence of ice.

The federation's support is vital to our survival and success. Please help us.

This will do nicely.

The people of Tria found new hope. Please accept our thanks."You're welcome."
Prefect Lauma, in Frontera, hopes to similarly benefit from federation assistance. Safe journey!
We know this is difficult, but we're out of options. Please help us.

Consul Dougal explained about the federation's initiative to help the outlying settlements. We need the aid.

We're short on luria fibers, xermetal ore, and lightning essence. Any additions to our stocks would be appreciated.

Dougal chose his assistant well. We're grateful for the help and will put these supplies to good use.

Dougal has also asked you to return to Velika. Farewell, .
We must have raw materials to keep Frontera active and productive.

I've heard nothing but good things about you. Even Turrek is more cheerful now.

There were no plots foiled or great beasts vanquished, but service to others is in the highest traditions of federation service. You've done well, . Thank you.
